timeline.bodyText: By this, do we mean that we make a new updater if we fall out of the window and/or there is a leader election?
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

replies.bodyText: Discussed offline: Usage is once per batch of updates, so that's ok - the calling class is responsible for invalidation in the election/too-much-lag cases.
replies.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: not sure how I feel about this test, it feels dependent on the contract of RangeSet (which is that it must coalesce) rather than anything we're doing in the code
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

replies.bodyText: That's fair, but it's critical for us that re-registering watches does not blow up our ranges so I think it's fine to have this just to verify the invariant. Also, RangeSet is technically @Beta...
replies.author: gmaretic
